attributes.action: Campain for a annual 5 day weekend.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 5 day's in the the summer months for the people of this land to spend being British!! Play cricket, Brighton Picnic's, Rock concert's- what ever makes you feel British, enjoy 5 day's celebrating it!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
